book.title: The Great Gatsby
book.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
book.text: The story revolves around Jay Gatsby and his obsession with Daisy Buchanan.
Gatsby's wealth and extravagant lifestyle are a facade for his true feelings.

book.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
book.author: Yuval Noah Harari
book.text: The book explores the history of humankind from the emergence of Homo sapiens in Africa to the present day.
It covers topics such as agriculture, empires, science, and the emergence of new economies.
